title: RIOT I hate you
body: I hate you guys, I just got done with a leaverbuster, my internet messes up after 3 matches when I was honored each match and you guys put me right back in??? are you KIIDDING ME? You dont even have a phone  number, yea how convenient.. my wifi screws up once and you guys put the hammer on me, thanks a lot

replies.body:
Leaverbuster won't occur with one leave, but a history of it.  I know that having a connection issue can feel out of your control, but [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) will treat all leaves equally because it still causes others a bad experience.  

Your best bet is to play through your games without further issues, and I recommend going over each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure your network is holding tightly.  Let me know if that clears things up!
